longDef.en: to stop someone or something from being killed, injured, or destroyed

examples.en: Wearing seat belts has saved many lives.
examples.cn: 使用安全带挽救了许多人的生命。

examples.en: He fell in the river but his friend saved him from drowning.
examples.cn: 他掉进了河里，不过他的朋友救了他的命。

examples.en: He had to borrow money to save his business.
examples.cn: 他只好借钱挽救自己的企业。

examples.en: He was desperately trying to save their failing marriage.
examples.cn: 他拼命努力，试图挽救他们濒临破裂的婚姻。

examples.en: We all need to do our part to save the planet.
examples.cn: 我们都需要为拯救这个星球尽一份力。

examples.en: The former tennis champion was now serving to save the match (= to win the next point so that the other player did not win this part of the competition).
examples.cn: 前网球冠军正在发球争取挽回败局。

longDef.en: to stop someone from being killed
longDef.cn: 使（某人）免遭杀害；救（某人）的性命

longDef.en: to help someone escape from a difficult or unpleasant situation
longDef.cn: 帮助（某人）脱离困境（或窘境）

examples.en: Thanks for helping me with that report - you saved my life!
examples.cn: 谢谢你帮助我完成那个报告——你真是帮了我大忙！

longDef.en: to keep something, especially money, for use in the future

examples.en: Tom's been saving his pocket money every week.
examples.cn: 汤姆每周都把自己的零花钱攒起来。

examples.en: We're saving (up) for a new car.
examples.cn: 我们正在攒钱准备买一辆新车。

examples.en: I save all my old letters in case I want to read them again.
examples.cn: 我把过去所有的信件都保存了下来，以便再读。

examples.en: Save me a place at your table, OK?
examples.cn: 你坐的那张桌子给我留个位子好吗？

longDef.en: to put information into a computer's memory or onto a computer disk
longDef.cn: 将（计算机上的信息）存盘，保存

examples.en: Don't forget to save your work regularly.

longDef.en: to prevent time, money, or effort being wasted or spent

examples.en: You'll save time if you take the car.
Thanks for your help - it saved me a lot of work.
examples.cn: 谢谢你的帮助——这省了我很多事。

examples.en: I'll lend you a bag for your trip - it'll save you buying one.
examples.cn: 我借给你一个旅行包——省得你专门再买一个。

examples.en: Can you save it for later (= tell me your news later when I am less busy)?
examples.cn: 你能等一下（在我不这么忙的时候）再告诉我吗？

longDef.en: in football and similar games, to stop the ball from going into the goal when a player on the other team has kicked or hit it
longDef.cn: （足球等球类运动中）救（球），阻止对方得（分）

longDef.en: in football or similar games, when a player stops the ball from going into the goal when it is hit or kicked by a player from the other team
longDef.cn: （足球等球类运动中）救（球），阻止对方得（分）

examples.en: The goalkeeper made a great save in the last minute of the game.
examples.cn: 守门员在比赛的最后关头有一次精彩的扑救。

examples.en: They found all the lost documents save one.
examples.cn: 除了其中有一份文件没有找到之外，他们找到了所有丢失的文件。
